name: Chocolate Meringue Cookies
description: Make the classic mixture and pipe out small meringues. Melt chocolate and dip meringues into melted chocolate.
recipeIngredient: 4 egg whites½ tsp (2 mL) salt1 cup (250 mL) sugar1 tbsp (15 mL) white vinegar or lemon juice
recipeInstructions: Beat egg whites with salt on medium speed until foamy, about 1 minute with an electric mixer, and slowly beat in sugar.

Increase speed to high and continue to beat until egg whites are stiš and glossy, about 5 to 8 minutes, depending on your beaters. When you lift the beaters, the whites should form stiš points that do not fall away. Beat in vinegar.

Draw a circle on parchment paper the size you want your meringue, 8 or 9 inches (20 cm to 23 cm). Spoon mixture into the circle and spread lightly with a knife or spatula. To make individual meringues, use a large oval spoon and scoop out onto parchment paper. This mixture will make about 8.
Bake for 1 hour then turn off the oven and let meringues cool in the oven. They will be slightly golden and crisp.
